title: How to make fresh tomatoes less squishable

description: The latest in science and policy

title: Possible misconduct found in papers from Italian minister of health
description: Orazio Schillaci, who publishes prolifically on nuclear medicine, denies responsibility for duplicated images in eight papers he co-authored between 2018 and 2022

description: After 33 years, the award continues to celebrate brilliant but unusual scientific research

title: Peak solar activity is arriving sooner than expected, reaching levels not seen in 20 years
description: The Sun’s flare-ups can threaten satellites and electric grids, highlighting need for better forecasts

title: What turns an ant into a soldier or a forager? It may be all in their heads

title: NIH sticks to new requirement that foreign partners share lab notebooks
